item1.title: Mali Kuremalay #01
item1.description: Mali Kuremalay gold mine has about 40 tons of gold reserves with a grade of about 5g/ton

item2.title: Côte d'Ivoire Dimbokro #02
item2.description: Côte d'Ivoire Dimbokro gold mine has 50+ tons of reserves, annual production of 4-6 tons, grade of 1.2-2.5g/ton

item3.title: Kenya #03
item3.description: Kenya gold mine has 30+ tons of reserves, annual production of 1-2 tons, grade of 0.8-2g/ton

item4.title: Tajikistan #04
item4.description: Tajikistan gold mine has 500+ tons of reserves, annual production of 6-8 tons, grade of 1.5-4g/ton
